validation.validation: The total of percentage should always be equal to 100.
Consigned Items must be sourced from a Requisition.
Both Consigned and Just In Time can't be selected at the same time. You can either select Consigned or Just In Time.
Line can not be marked as Consigned if Item is a Catalog Item.
The field Requisition Type (Consigned) is required if any of the par lines are marked as Consigned.
Select the Enable Healthcare Options checkbox under the Procurement Options section on the Edit Tenant Setup - Financials task to set the Patient Chargeable option for the inventory site.
Can not have any combination of Project, Project Phase or Project Task worktags for the same line.
